messages.content: You are a product expert for our e-commerce store.
Tell me about the Basic Crew T-shirt

The Basic Crew T-shirt is priced at $39. The GAZMAN basic crew T-shirt is a wardrobe must have. We have refined the wash to perfection, creating one of the most comfortable and long lasting men's T-shirts available. All you have to do is enjoy wearing it. A classic, versatile tee - a great layering piece in winter or on its own paired with shorts in summer. It belongs to the shirt category and has a rating of 4.4. It's currently on sale with 15% off!
You are a product expert for our e-commerce store.

Available options: Size S is available in black. Size M is available in gray. Size L is available in gray
You are a product expert for our e-commerce store.

The Basic Crew T-shirt is priced at $39 and is currently on sale with 15% off!
You are a product expert for our e-commerce store.
Tell me about the Stretch Bedford Cord Pants

The Stretch Bedford Cord Pants is priced at $109. A classic 5 pocket, jean styled pant, the Stretch Bedford Cord Pants come with added stretch for comfortable, everyday wear. The Tailored Non-Iron Dobby Long Sleeve Shirt is priced at $119.0. Perfect for the modern professional, the men's Tailored Non-Iron Dobby Long Sleeve Shirt is made from high-quality dobby fabric with a unique geometric pattern. Thanks to our advanced non-iron technology, it stays crisp and wrinkle-free all day. Ideal for both work and special occasions, it combines style and practicality effortlessly. It belongs to the shirt category and has a rating of 4.6. It's currently on sale with 25% off!

Tell me about the Waffle Half Zip Knit

The Waffle Half Zip Knit is priced at $89. The Waffle Half Zip Knit was a best seller last winter and will be sure to sell out again.  Crafted to perfection and in a regular fit this men's knit offers a casual style that can be either dressed up for more sophisticated winter events layered with a sports coat or casually over a t-shirt and jeans for when you want to go and watch sports or run your weekend errands in comfort. Available in four colours. It belongs to the shirt category and has a rating of 4.9.

Tell me about the Classic Pique Polo

The Classic Pique Polo is priced at $69. A classic in any man's wardrobe, our GAZMAN Classic Pique Polo shirt is an easy choice for all year round. Available in a vast array of colours to suit every style and occasion, make sure you have a few colours in your wardrobe on rotation for spring. Tell me about the Modern Chino Pants

The Modern Chino Pants is priced at $109. Designed for the man of today, our modern  fit chino adds a smart finish to every outfit, with less fabric gathering around the ankle. The perfect balance between form-fitting and comfort, these slim chinos are made from a mid-weight soft twill fabric for added stretch and wearability. Available in a variety of colours for easy matching. A staple for effortless style, this slim fit gives a modern look, taking you from the office to casual weekends. It belongs to the pant category and has a rating of 4.2. It's currently on sale with 20% off!

Tell me about the GAZFLEX Reversible Vest

The GAZFLEX Reversible Vest is priced at $149. Introducing the GAZFLEX Reversible Vest, engineered for performance in every element. Designed with a wind shield and center front zip closure, it provides exceptional protection against chilly gusts on the golf course. Its reversible feature offers versatility for seamless style transitions. The full internal lining with wadding ensures maximum warmth in any condition. Plus, the showerproof exterior keeps you dry during unexpected showers. Elevate your outdoor adventures with the GAZFLEX Reversible Vest, the ultimate mix of style and functionality. It belongs to the shirt category and has a rating of 3.4. It's currently on sale with 15% off!
